meanings.definition: A person or thing that sticks.
meanings.sent1: The stickers on the wall stayed in place.
meanings.sent2: I found stickers on my shoes after walking in the park.
meanings.sent3: The stickers on the fridge seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like stickers, leaving a lasting impression on everyone.
meanings.sent5: The stickers on the window sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A small piece of paper, fabric, plastic, or similar material with an adhesive backing that is used to decorate or label objects.
meanings.sent1: She collected stickers to put in her scrapbook.
meanings.sent2: The teacher gave out stickers to the students for their good work.
meanings.sent3: The stickers on the notebook made it look more colorful.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a sticker, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The stickers on the gift added a special touch.

meanings.definition: A person who sticks to a particular set of beliefs or practices.
meanings.sent1: She was known as a sticker for always following the rules.
meanings.sent2: The team captain was a sticker for fair play.
meanings.sent3: The sticker of the group, he never missed a meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her loyalty was like a sticker, unwavering and strong.
meanings.sent5: He was a sticker for punctuality, always arriving early.
